product_name: Marmot Sabrina Tank Top - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: With a built-in shelf bra and plenty of stretch, you'll want to wear the women's Marmot Sabrina Tank Top at the crags on summer days or under another shirt on cooler forest hikes. Soft yet abrasion-resistant, the nylon Supplex(R) top with elastane for stretch is breathable, moisture-wicking and quick-drying. Offers UPF 50+ sun protection. Built-in 3-piece shelf bra has mesh paneling for added breathability. Narrow adjustable straps are perfect for layering. Marmot Sabrina Tank Top has flatlock seams for smooth comfort. Closeout.
short_description: With a built-in shelf bra and plenty of stretch, you'll want to wear the women's Marmot Sabrina Tank Top at the crags on summer days or under another shirt on cooler forest hikes.
